【考法 1】 adj. 有害的： highly injurious or destructive
【例】 Business may be troublesome but idleness is pernicious. 工作烦人，懒散害人
【近】 adverse, baleful, damaging, deleterious, detrimental, hurtful, injurious, mischievous恶作剧的；有害的, nocuous有害的；有毒的, noxious
【反】 anodyne, benign, harmless, innocent, innocuous, inoffensive, safe 温和的，无害的
【记】 from per- "completely"+ necis "violent death, murder,"
【另】 internecine 互相残杀的，perjury 假誓
